info.title: Chomp Food Database API Documentation
info.description:
__Important:__
  - An __[API key](https://chompthis.com/api/)__ is required for access to this API.
  - Get yours at __[https://chompthis.com/api](https://chompthis.com/api/)__.

-----

__Getting Started:__
  - __[Subscribe](https://chompthis.com/api/#pricing)__ to the API.
  - Scroll down and click the "__Authorize__" button.
  - Enter your API key into the "__value__" input, click the "__Authorize__" button, then click the "__Close__" button.
  - Scroll down to the section titled "__default__" and click on the API endpoint you wish to use.
  - Click the "__Try it out__" button.
  - Enter the information the endpoint requires.
  - Click the "__Execute__" button.

__Example:__ 
  - Branded Food: __[View example](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/chompfoods/examples/master/branded-food-response-object.json)__ API response object.
  - Ingredient: __[View example](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/chompfoods/examples/master/ingredient-response-object.json)__ API response object.

-----

__How Do I Find My API Key?__
  - Your API key was sent to the email address you used to create your subscription.
  - You will also find your API key in the __[Client Center](https://chompthis.com/api/manage.php)__.
  - _Read __[this article](https://desk.zoho.com/portal/chompthis/kb/articles/how-do-i-find-my-api-key)__ for more information._

|||
| ------- | -------- |
| [Knowledge Base](https://desk.zoho.com/portal/chompthis/kb/chomp) | [Pricing](https://chompthis.com/api/) |
| [Attribution](https://chompthis.com/api/docs/attribution.php) | [Cost Calculator](https://chompthis.com/api/cost-calculator.php) |
| [Terms & License](https://chompthis.com/api/terms.php) | [Database Search](https://chompthis.com/api/lookup.php) |
| [Support](https://chompthis.com/api/ticket-new.php) | [Query Builder](https://chompthis.com/api/build.php) |
| [Client Center](https://chompthis.com/api/manage.php) | |

get.summary: Get a branded food item using a barcode
get.description:
# Get data for a branded food using the food's UPC/EAN barcode.

__Example:__ ```https://chompthis.com/api/v2/food/branded/barcode.php?api_key=API_KEY&code=CODE```

parameters.name: code
parameters.description:
UPC/EAN barcode

__Example:__ 0842234000988

__Resources:__ [Database search](https://chompthis.com/api/lookup.php)

_Read [this article](https://desk.zoho.com/portal/chompthis/kb/articles/im-having-trouble-getting-matches-for-barcodes-what-can-id-do) for tips and tricks._

200.description: __Valid__ - Will return an object containing any matching foods.

401.description: __Unauthorized__ - Invalid API key or usage limits exceeded. _[More information](https://desk.zoho.com/portal/chompthis/kb/articles/what-is-a-rate-limit)_

404.description: __Not found__ - No food items exist that match your query parameters.

500.description: __Server error__ - Internal server error, request failed, or base error. _[Contact us](https://chompthis.com/api/ticket-new.php) if you see this._

get.summary: Get a branded food item using an ID number
get.description:
# Get data for a branded food using Chomp's internal ID number.

_Alternatively, set the "source" parameter to "USDA" and use the food's FDC ID._

__Example:__ ```https://chompthis.com/api/v2/food/branded/id.php?api_key=API_KEY&id=ID```

parameters.name: id
parameters.description:
Chomp branded food ID.

_Set "source=USDA" if you wish to pass in the food's FoodData Central ID (fdc_id)._

__Example #1:__ 15

__Resources:__ [Find branded food
IDs](https://chompthis.com/api/lookup.php)

parameters.name: source
parameters.description:
Specify the data source (optional).

You must pass in "USDA" if you want to look up a food item using a USDA FDC ID.

__Example:__ USDA _(defaults to "Chomp")_

200.description: __Valid__ - Will return an object containing any matching foods.

401.description: __Unauthorized__ - Invalid API key or usage limits exceeded. _[More information](https://desk.zoho.com/portal/chompthis/kb/articles/what-is-a-rate-limit)_

404.description: __Not found__ - No food items exist that match your query parameters.

500.description: __Server error__ - Internal server error, request failed, or base error. _[Contact us](https://chompthis.com/api/ticket-new.php) if you see this._

get.summary: Get a branded food item by name
get.description:
# Search for branded food items by name.

__Example:__ ```https://chompthis.com/api/v2/food/branded/name.php?api_key=API_KEY&name=NAME```

parameters.name: name
parameters.description:
Branded food name

__Example:__ Starburst

__Resources:__ [Find branded food
names](https://chompthis.com/api/lookup.php)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description:
Set maximum number of records you want the API to return.

___Note:__ The maximum value is 10._

__Example:__ 3 _(defaults to 10)_

200.description: __Valid__ - Will return an object containing any matching foods.

401.description: __Unauthorized__ - Invalid API key or usage limits exceeded. _[More information](https://desk.zoho.com/portal/chompthis/kb/articles/what-is-a-rate-limit)_

404.description: __Not found__ - No food items exist that match your query parameters.

500.description: __Server error__ - Internal server error, request failed, or base error. _[Contact us](https://chompthis.com/api/ticket-new.php) if you see this._

get.summary: Get data for branded food items using various search parameters
get.description:
# Search for branded food items using various parameters.

__Example:__ ```https://chompthis.com/api/v2/food/branded/search.php?api_key=API_KEY&brand=BRAND&country=COUNTRY&page=1```

___Tip:__ Get started by using the [Query Builder](https://chompthis.com/api/build.php)._

parameters.name: allergen
parameters.description:
Specify a required allergen ingredient (optional)

__Example__: Peanuts

__Resources__: [List of
allergens](https://chompthis.com/api/data/allergen.php)

parameters.name: brand
parameters.description:
Specify a required brand (optional)

__Example__: Starbucks

__Resources__: [List of
brands](https://chompthis.com/api/data/brand.php)

parameters.name: category
parameters.description:
Specify a required category (optional)

__Example__: Pasta Dishes

__Resources__: [List of
categories](https://chompthis.com/api/data/category.php)

parameters.name: country
parameters.description:
Specify a required country (optional)

__Example__: United States

__Resources__: [List of
countries](https://chompthis.com/api/data/country.php)

parameters.name: diet
parameters.description:
Specify a required diet (optional)

_Filters the search to only include food items that are considered compatible with the following diets: Vegan, Vegetarian, Gluten Free_

__Example__: Gluten Free

__Resources__: [List of
diets](https://chompthis.com/api/data/lifestyle.php)

parameters.name: ingredient
parameters.description:
Specify a required ingredient (optional)

__Example__: Salt

__Resources__: [List of
ingredients](https://chompthis.com/api/data/ingredient.php)

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description:
Specify a required keyword (optional)

__Example__: Starbucks

__Resources__: [List of
brands](https://chompthis.com/api/data/brand.php)

parameters.name: mineral
parameters.description:
Specify a required mineral (optional)

__Example__: Potassium

__Resources__: [List of
minerals](https://chompthis.com/api/data/mineral.php)

parameters.name: nutrient
parameters.description:
Specify a required nutrition label item (optional)

__Example__: Caffeine

__Resources__: [List of nutrition label
items](https://chompthis.com/api/data/nutrition.php)

parameters.name: palm_oil
parameters.description:
Specify a required palm oil ingredient (optional)

__Example__: E160a Beta Carotene

__Resources__: [List of palm oil
ingredients](https://chompthis.com/api/data/palm-oil.php)

parameters.name: trace
parameters.description:
Specify a required trace ingredient (optional)

__Example__: Tree Nuts

__Resources__: [List of trace
ingredients](https://chompthis.com/api/data/trace.php)

parameters.name: vitamin
parameters.description:
Specify a required vitamin (optional)

__Example__: Biotin

__Resources__: [List of
vitamins](https://chompthis.com/api/data/vitamin.php)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description:
Set maximum number of records you want the API to return.

___Note:__ The maximum value is 10._

__Example:__ 3 _(defaults to 10)_

parameters.name: page
parameters.description:
Specify the search response page number.

_Each page will contain up to 10 items._

__Example__: 1 _(default)_

200.description: __Valid__ - Will return an object containing any matching foods.

401.description: __Unauthorized__ - Invalid API key or usage limits exceeded. _[More information](https://desk.zoho.com/portal/chompthis/kb/articles/what-is-a-rate-limit)_

404.description: __Not found__ - No food items exist that match your query parameters.

500.description: __Server error__ - Internal server error, request failed, or base error. _[Contact us](https://chompthis.com/api/ticket-new.php) if you see this._

get.description:
# Get data for a specific ingredient or a specific set of ingredients.

__Example:__ ```https://chompthis.com/api/v2/ingredient/search.php?api_key=API_KEY&find=STRING/LIST&list=BOOLEAN&raw=BOOLEAN```

parameters.name: find
parameters.description:
Specify the ingredient name(s).

__Example #1:__ broccoli

__Example #2:__ broccoli,cauliflower,spinach

___Important Note:__ Set the "is_list" parameter to true before passing in a comma-separated list of ingredients._

parameters.name: list
parameters.description:
Specify if you are searching for multiple ingredients.

_Setting this to true will configure this endpoint so that it accepts a comma-separated list of ingredients._

_By default, this endpoint expects a single ingredient._

__Example:__ true _(defaults to false)_

parameters.name: raw
parameters.description:
Specify if you only want data for raw ingredients.

__Example:__ true _(defaults to true)_

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description:
Set maximum number of records you want the API to return.

___Important Note:__ Setting this to "1" will return 1 record per search term._

__Example:__ 1 _(defaults to 1, max is 3)_

200.description: __Valid__ - Will return an object containing any matching ingredient foods.

401.description: __Unauthorized__ - Invalid API key or usage limits exceeded. _[More information](https://desk.zoho.com/portal/chompthis/kb/articles/what-is-a-rate-limit)_

404.description: __Not found__ - No food items exist that match your query parameters.

500.description: __Server error__ - Internal server error, request failed, or base error. _[Contact us](https://chompthis.com/api/ticket-new.php) if you see this._

items.description: An array containing an object for each individual item returned by your API call.

BrandedFoodObject.description: Please read the description of each field in this API response object example. By default, the value of each field is __null__. This indicates an unknown state or that no data exists.

items.description: An array containing an object for each individual item returned by your API call.

IngredientObject.description: Please read the description of each field in this API response object example. By default, the value of each field is __null__. This indicates an unknown state or that no data exists.

BrandedFoodObject_package.description: An object containing basic packaging information about this item

measurement_unit.description: Serving measurement unit (e.g. if measure is 3 tsp, the unit is tsp)

BrandedFoodObject_serving.description: An object containing serving information for this item

measurement_unit.description: The unit used for measure (e.g. if mesure is 3 tsp, the unit is tsp)

per_100g.description: Amount of the nutrient per 100g of food
Amount of the nutrient per 100g of food

measurement_unit.description: The unit used for the measure of this nutrient

data_points.description: Number of observations on which the value is based

footnote.description: Comments on any unusual aspect of the food nutrient. Examples might include why a nutrient value is different than typically expected.

chomp.description: An array containing an object for each nutrient data point

usda.description: An array containing an object for each nutrient data point as found in the USDA database

BrandedFoodObject_nutrients.description: An object containing nutrient information from multiple sources

BrandedFoodObject_calorie_conversion_fac.description: An object containing the multiplication factors to be used when calculating energy from macronutrients for a specific food.

is_compatible.description: Boolean describing if this item is compatible with this diet

compatibility_level.description: Numeric representation of how compatible this item is with this diet. Higher values indicate more compatibility

confidence.description: Boolean that indicates if we are confident in how this item is graded for this diet

confidence_description.description: Description of our confidence that this item was graded correctly

BrandedFoodObject_diet_labels_vegan.description: An object containing information on this item's compatibility with the Vegan diets

is_compatible.description: Boolean describing if this item is compatible with this diet

compatibility_level.description: Numeric representation of how compatible this item is with this diet. Higher values indicate more compatibility

confidence.description: Boolean that indicates if we are confident in how this item is graded for this diet

confidence_description.description: Description of our confidence that this item was graded correctly

BrandedFoodObject_diet_labels_vegetarian.description: An object containing information on this item's compatibility with Vegetarian diets

is_compatible.description: Boolean describing if this item is compatible with this diet

compatibility_level.description: Numeric representation of how compatible this item is with this diet. Higher values indicate more compatibility

confidence.description: Boolean that indicates if we are confident in how this item is graded for this diet

confidence_description.description: Description of our confidence that this item was graded correctly

BrandedFoodObject_diet_labels_gluten_fre.description: An object containing information on this item's compatibility with Gluten Free diets

BrandedFoodObject_diet_labels.description: An object containing this item's compatibility grades for each supported diet

diet_label.description: Name of the diet with which this ingredient may not be compatible

is_compatible.description: A description of if we believe this ingredient is compatible with the diet

compatibility_level.description: A numeric representation of if we believe this ingredient is compatible with the diet. Higher values indicate more compatibility

compatibility_description.description: A description of how we graded this ingredient for compatibility with the diet

is_allergen.description: Boolean representing if the ingredient is a known allergen

BrandedFoodObject_diet_flags.description: An object containing information on an individual ingredient that was flagged as potentially not being compatible with a certain diet

small.description: Small photo of the front of this item's packaging

thumb.description: Thumbnail photo of the front of this item's packaging

display.description: Full-sized photo of the front of this item's packaging

BrandedFoodObject_packaging_photos_front.description: An object containing photos of the front of this item's packaging

small.description: Small photo of this item's nutrition label

thumb.description: Thumbnail photo of this item's nutrition label

display.description: Full-sized photo of this item's nutrition label

BrandedFoodObject_packaging_photos_nutri.description: An object containing photos of this item's nutrition label

small.description: Small photo of the ingredients on this item's packaging

thumb.description: Thumbnail photo of the ingredients on this item's packaging

display.description: Full-sized photo of the ingredients on this item's packaging

BrandedFoodObject_packaging_photos_ingre.description: An object containing photos of the ingredients on this item's packaging

BrandedFoodObject_packaging_photos.description: A object containing a collection of photos of this item's packaging

name.description: The kind of component, e.g. bone

pct_weight.description: The weight of the component as a percentage of the total weight of the food

gram_weight.description: The weight of the component in grams

is_refuse.description: Whether the component is refuse, i.e. not edible

data_points.description: The number of obersvations on which the measure is based

BrandedFoodObject_components.description: An object containing information on a specific component of this food item

measurement_unit.description: The unit used for measure (e.g. if mesure is 3 tsp, the unit is tsp)

description.description: Comments that provide more specificity on the measure. For example, for a pizza measure the dissemination text might be 1 slice is 1/8th of a 14 inch pizza.

modifier.description: Qualifier of the measure (e.g. related to food shape or form) (e.g. melted, crushed, diced)

gram_weight.description: The weight of the measure in grams

data_points.description: The number of observations on which the measure is based

footnote.description: Comments on any unusual aspects of the measure. Examples might includes caveats on the usage of a measure, or reasons why a measure gram weight is an unexpected value.

BrandedFoodObject_portions.description: An object containing information on a specific food portion found in this item

english_speaking.description: The number of countries where English is the country's primary language

non_english_speaking.description: The number of countries where English is not the country's primary language

BrandedFoodObject_country_details.description: An object containing additional information on the countries where this item is found

name.description: Item name as provided by brand owner or as shown on packaging

brand.description: The brand name that owns this item

ingredients.description: Ingredients in order of highest value to least

items.description: An array of categories for this item

protein_conversion_factor.description: The multiplication factor used to calculate protein from nitrogen

diet_flags.description: An array of ingredient objects that were flagged while grading this item for compatibility with each diet

components.description: An array of objects containing the constituent parts of a food (e.g. bone is a component of meat)

portions.description: An array of objects containing information on discrete amounts of a food found in this item

allergens.description: An array of ingredients in this item that may cause allergic reactions in people

brand_list.description: An array of brands we have associated with this item. Some items are sold by more than 1 brand.

countries.description: An array of countries where this item is sold

palm_oil_ingredients.description: An array of ingredients made from palm oil

ingredient_list.description: An array of this item's ingredients

has_english_ingredients.description: A boolean indicating if we have English ingredients for this item

minerals.description: An array of minerals that this item contains

traces.description: An array of trace ingredients that may be found in this item

vitamins.description: An array of vitamins that are found in this item

common_name.description: Common names associated with this item. These generally clarify what the item is (e.g. when the brand name is "BRAND's Spicy Enchilada" the common name may be "Chicken enchilada")

keywords.description: An array of keywords that can be used to describe this item

footnote.description: Comments on any unusual aspects of this item. Examples might include unusual aspects of the food overall.

BrandedFoodObject_items.description: An object containing information for this specific item.

usda.description: An array containing an object for each nutrient data point as found in the USDA database

IngredientObject_nutrients.description: An object containing nutrient information from each source

name.description: Item name as provided by brand owner or as shown on packaging

items.description: An array of categories for this item

protein_conversion_factor.description: The multiplication factor used to calculate protein from nitrogen

components.description: An array of objects containing the constituent parts of a food (e.g. bone is a component of meat)

portions.description: An array of objects containing information on discrete amounts of a food found in this item

common_name.description: Common names associated with this item. These generally clarify what the item is (e.g. when the brand name is "BRAND's Spicy Enchilada" the common name may be "Chicken enchilada")

footnote.description: Comments on any unusual aspects of this item. Examples might include unusual aspects of the food overall.

IngredientObject_items.description: An object containing information for this specific item.

200BrandedResponse.description: __Valid__ - Will return an object containing any matching foods.

200IngredientResponse.description: __Valid__ - Will return an object containing any matching ingredient foods.

401Error.description: __Unauthorized__ - Invalid API key or usage limits exceeded. _[More information](https://desk.zoho.com/portal/chompthis/kb/articles/what-is-a-rate-limit)_

404Error.description: __Not found__ - No food items exist that match your query parameters.

500Error.description: __Server error__ - Internal server error, request failed, or base error. _[Contact us](https://chompthis.com/api/ticket-new.php) if you see this._
